name: Honda CBR 600RR Keys
description: Keys to her motorcycle, including a small keychain with a worn leather tag

name: Empty Ashtray
description: A heavy glass ashtray, recently emptied of cigarette butts and ash. Has a slight smoky smell.

name: Danny's lighter
description: A cheap disposable lighter, probably nicked from a newsagent. Smells faintly of petrol and has a few scratches on the plastic casing.
obtained: Taken from Danny's pocket at The Haçienda
